title: [Large-Scale] Learning Objective Design and Experimental Evaluation Methodology

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory knowledge and experience in assessment design
context.additional_context: For pre-/in-service elementary teachers, explores learning objective design and empirical evaluation methods applicable to science subjects. Synchronous/asynchronous activities are conducted in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately design subject-specific science learning objectives with at least 80% accuracy by applying criteria for clarity and specificity.
Students can write a report analyzing the impact of learning objective articulation on student performance using experimental research methods.
Students can comparatively explain the roles and limitations of learning objectives from the perspectives of various stakeholders (teachers, evaluators, students).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
